title: featurization takes too much ram
body:
Running mp_e_form featurization with "fast" preset on Haswell node (128GB memory):


```
2019-04-04 13:06:01 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Starting fitting.
2019-04-04 13:06:01 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Adding compositions from structures.
StructureToComposition: 100%|██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 132752/132752 [00:51<00:00, 2556.75it/s]
2019-04-04 13:06:54 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Guessing oxidation states of compositions, as they were not present in input.
CompositionToOxidComposition: 100%|████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 132752/132752 [02:02<00:00, 1079.53it/s]
2019-04-04 13:11:04 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Featurizer type bandstructure not in the dataframe to be fitted. Skipping...
2019-04-04 13:11:04 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Featurizer type dos not in the dataframe to be fitted. Skipping...
2019-04-04 13:11:04 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Finished fitting.
2019-04-04 13:11:04 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Starting transforming.
2019-04-04 13:11:04 INFO     AutoFeaturizer: Featurizing with AtomicOrbitals.

...

GlobalSymmetryFeatures:  68%|███████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████▎                                    | 90825/132752 [01:06<00:54, 770.73it/s]
srun: error: nid00227: task 0: Out Of Memory
srun: Terminating job step 20246113.0
salloc: Relinquishing job allocation 20246113
```

So it seems trading inplace=True for inplace=False results in these kinds of errors (although they were probably present before as well, just inplace=True ran too slow to ever get to them for the big datasets).
